title: The films of Kenneth Anger - vol 1 (1947-1954)  / DVD9
description:
The films of Kenneth Anger - vol 1 (1947-1954)  <a href="

http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0001910/</a>

Cinematic magician, legendary provocateur, author of the infamous Hollywood Babylon books and creator of some of the most striking and beautiful works in the history of film, Kenneth Anger is a singular figure in post-war American culture.
A major influence on everything from the films of Martin Scorsese, Rainer Werner Fassbinder and David Lynch to the pop art of Andy Warhol to MTV, Anger&#039;s work serves as a talisman of universal symbols and personal obsessions, combining myth, artifice and ritual to render cinema with the power of a spell or incantation.

This DVD covers the first half of Anger&#039;s career.
Contains the films:
Fireworks (1947)
Puce Moment (1949)
Rabbits Moon (1950, the rarley seen original 16 minute version)
Eaux dÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â´artifice (1953)
Inauguration of the pleasure dome (1954)

Ripped with DVD-Shrink. Untouched DVD9. 
Released by Fantoma ( http://fantoma.com ) and comes in a beautiful digipack including a 48 page full color book with extensive info and rare pictures about all the films. 
It is well worth the money to buy this DVD if youre a Kenneth Anger fan.

Includes a custom cover I put together with scans from the digipack.

Volume 2 is uploaded here: http://thepiratebay.se/tor/4128613
